product_name: The North Face Leonidas Jacket - Women's
long_description: Designed to keep alpinists dry on wet, vertical ascents, the women's Leonidas Jacket from The North Face features waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) fabric with comfort-extending stretch. HyVent 2.5-layer nylon is fully seam sealed and offers mechanical 4-way stretch for mobility. Pit zips let you vent excess heat instantly. Fully adjustable, helmet-compatible hood has hidden cord locks and a laminated brim; adjusts in a single pull and does not hinder peripheral vision. Alpine handwarmer pockets are harness- and pack-friendly. The North Face Leonidas Jacket features nonabrasive, molded cuff tabs and a hidden hem cinch-cord to seal out storms. This item is part of the North Face Summit Series(TM), apparel designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
short_description: Designed to keep alpinists dry on wet, vertical ascents, the women's Leonidas Jacket from The North Face features waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) fabric with comfort-extending stretch.
